Name Rascal/Libraries/Vis/Figure/Properties/valign

Synopsis Vertical alignment.
Function FProperty valign(num v)
Description Set the vertical alignment to v.

Also see align and CompositionModel.
Examples 
b1 = box(size(100,50), valign(0), resizable(false), fillColor("Red"));
b2 = box(b1, size(150, 100));
render(b2);



b1 = box(size(100,50), valign(1), resizable(false), fillColor("Red"));
b2 = box(b1, size(150, 100));
render(b2);
